series_description: This series documents applications from federations to apply to the combined campaign.
retention_statement: Retain 3 years after campaign closed, then destroy in compliance with No. 8 on schedule cover page.

series_description: This series documents applications from charities not associated with federations to apply to the combined campaign.
retention_statement: Retain 3 years after campaign closed, then destroy in compliance with No. 8 on schedule cover page.

series_description: This series documents applications from regional federations to apply to the combined campaign.
retention_statement: Retain 3 years after campaign closed, then destroy in compliance with No. 8 on schedule cover page.

series_description: This series documents the campaign data of all donations given to each charity from state agency and/or region.
retention_statement: Retain 3 years after final payment, then destroy in compliance with No. 8 on schedule cover page.

series_description: This series documents completed forms from state agency with all contract information about their designated CVC Coordinator.
retention_statement: Retain 3 years after campaign closed, then destroy in compliance with No. 8 on schedule cover page.

series_description: This series documents correspondence from charities asking to reconsider rejection of their application to the combined campaign.
retention_statement: Retain 3 years after campaign closed, then transfer to the Records Center, Library of Virginia. Retain in Records Center 7 years. Total retention 10 years, then destroy in compliance with No. 8 on schedule cover page.

series_description: This series documents board/commission meetings for election of officers and advisory boards.
retention_statement: Retain 3 years after campaign closed, then transfer to the , Library of Virginia for permanent retention.

series_description: This series documents monthly reports on the status of the campaign and suggestions of improvement for the campaign.
retention_statement: Retain 3 years after campaign closed, then destroy.

series_description: This series documents the CVC Surveys that are sent to state employees. The questions are designed to let the state employee inform the campaign's organizers what they know about the campaign, what they like, and what they would change.
retention_statement: Retain 3 years after campaign closed, then destroy.

series_description: This series documents questionnaires sent to a limited population for their opinion of the CVC Program.
retention_statement: Retain 3 years after campaign closed, then destroy.

series_description: This series documents rules and regulations for the combined campaign.
retention_statement: Retain 3 years after campaign closed, then transfer to the , Library of Virginia for permanent retention.
